title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 207.12 - Expedited rendition of award
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 207.12 - Expedited rendition of award

State Regulations
(a) Should the parties mutually agree to an expedited rendition of the arbitrator's
award, notice in the form of a joint request in writing shall be received by
the director of conciliation before designating the arbitrator. (b) The decision of the arbitrator shall be
in the form of an award only, and shall be rendered within seven days after the
arbitrator has declared the hearing closed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
207.12

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
